Package com.itkolleg.bookingsystem.repos.desk

Class DeskRepo_JPAH2

java.lang.Object
com.itkolleg.bookingsystem.repos.desk.DeskRepo_JPAH2
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeskRepo
@Component public class DeskRepo_JPAH2 extends Object implements DeskRepo
This class implements the DeskRepo interface using JPA and H2 database. It provides methods for CRUD operations and other desk-related operations. It also handles exceptions related to desk operations.
Since:
2023-05-24
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sonja Lechner
